Title: Enhanced optical nonlinearity of metasurfaces made of patterned graphene nanoribbons
Abstract: © 2018 The Author(s).We demonstrate that the effective nonlinear susceptibility of a graphene nanoribbon metasurface can be enhanced by 4 orders of magnitude as compared to that of a graphene sheet via a double-resonant plasmon excitation mechanism.
